parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The data quality scan task name for fuzzy match.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description:
The list of sorting fields. Supports fields such as last modified time and creation time. Format: "SortField+SortOrder (Desc/Asc)", where Asc is the default. Valid values:

*   ModifyTime (Desc/Asc)
*   CreateTime (Desc/Asc)
*   Id (Desc/Asc)

parameters.name: Table
parameters.description: Fuzzy match for the monitored table name.
